document.full_text: pakistan's military was ridiculed and accused of complicity in the media on tuesday after a small group of militants laid siege to a naval air base, holding out for 16 hours against hundreds of commandos and rangers.
document.title: pakistan media ridicules military after attack on naval air base
lines_and_colors: pakistan's military was ridiculed and accused of complicity in the media on tuesday after a small group of militants laid siege to a naval air base, holding out for 16 hours against hundreds of commandos and rangers.
